summary: An average or mean is a number that is typical of a group of numbers.
full_text: In colloquial language, an average is the sum of a list of numbers divided by the number of numbers in the list. In mathematics and statistics, this would be called the arithmetic mean. However, the word "average" may also refer to the median, mode, or other central or typical value. In statistics, these are all known as measures of central tendency.
title: Average
